changeSet.sql: create table courses ( id integer not null auto_increment, address varchar(255), coach_required varchar(255), education_type varchar(255), finish_date date, is_finished varchar(255), is_started varchar(255), num_of_lessons integer, num_of_students integer, price integer, remaining integer, start_date date, subgroup_num integer, title varchar(255), coach_id integer, primary key (id), foreign key (coach_id) references coaches (id) );
